extracted_playbook.title: Update OpenSSH
extracted_playbook.description: Install the latest updated OpenSSH 9.3p2 version to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Start ssh-agent with an empty PKCS#11/FIDO allowlist
extracted_playbook.description: Prevent exploitation by starting ssh-agent with an empty PKCS#11/FIDO allowlist.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure ssh-agent with a specific provider allowlist
extracted_playbook.description: Prevent exploitation by configuring ssh-agent with an allowlist that contains only specific provider libraries.
